info.name: FimFiction Classic Genre Colors
info.description: A light userstyle to restore the classic colors to FimFiction's genre tags. CSS courtesy Exuno.
info.additionalInfo:
v1.1 (2017-06-05) - Fixed tags to not change on hover anymore. Code for this could probably be much cleaner/more efficient.

v1.0 (2017-06-05) - Initial release
